mapper.insert: /* SC_01_01_01_practiceDetailInputRepository.insertPractice */ INSERT INTO TH0101_PRACTICE_MNG VALUES( #{form.practiceMngNo}, #{form.overview}, '1', #{form.detail}, #{form.memo}, 1, '0', SYSDATE, #{account.userCd}, SYSDATE, #{account.userCd} )

/* SC_01_01_01_practiceDetailInputRepository.insertPracticeModule */ INSERT INTO TH0102_PRACTICE_MODULE VALUES( #{practiceMngNo}, #{index}, #{overview}, #{moduleName}, #{module}, 1, '0', SYSDATE, #{account.userCd}, SYSDATE, #{account.userCd} )

/* SC_01_01_01_practiceDetailInputRepository.insertPracticeBibliography */ INSERT INTO TH0103_PRACTICE_BIBLIOGRAPHY VALUES( #{practiceMngNo}, #{index}, #{form.name}, #{form.publisher}, 1, '0', SYSDATE, #{account.userCd}, SYSDATE, #{account.userCd} )

/* SC_01_01_01_practiceDetailInputRepository.insertPracticeWebsite */ INSERT INTO TH0104_PRACTICE_WEBSITE VALUES( #{practiceMngNo}, #{index}, #{form.overview}, #{form.url}, 1, '0', SYSDATE, #{account.userCd}, SYSDATE, #{account.userCd} )

/* SC_01_01_01_practiceDetailInputRepository.insertPracticeDocment */ INSERT INTO TH0105_PRACTICE_DOCUMENT VALUES( #{practiceMngNo}, #{index}, #{overview}, #{documentName}, #{document}, 1, '0', SYSDATE, #{account.userCd}, SYSDATE, #{account.userCd} )
